bug.author: davequinta
bug.description:
System information
Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in TensorFlow): OS Platform and Distribution: Google Collab TensorFlow installed from (source or binary): TensorFlow version (use command below): 2.2.0 Python version: 3.6
Describe the current behavior It happens when we(<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mtrejo>@mtrejo</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/DYuusha>@DYuusha</denchmark-link> ) try to use tfds.load of 'plant_village, it throws this error: DownloadError: Failed to get url <denchmark-link:https://data.mendeley.com/datasets/tywbtsjrjv/1/files/127d0761-7c63-46f0-b08e-d0d9f7cad9da/Plant_leaf_diseases_dataset_without_augmentation.zip>https://data.mendeley.com/datasets/tywbtsjrjv/1/files/127d0761-7c63-46f0-b08e-d0d9f7cad9da/Plant_leaf_diseases_dataset_without_augmentation.zip</denchmark-link> . HTTP code: 404. And it's because, the url is different from the ones in the docs. <denchmark-link:https://data.mendeley.com/datasets/tywbtsjrjv/1/files/d5652a28-c1d8-4b76-97f3-72fb80f94efc/Plant_leaf_diseases_dataset_without_augmentation.zip>https://data.mendeley.com/datasets/tywbtsjrjv/1/files/d5652a28-c1d8-4b76-97f3-72fb80f94efc/Plant_leaf_diseases_dataset_without_augmentation.zip</denchmark-link>
: <denchmark-link:https://data.mendeley.com/datasets/tywbtsjrjv/1/files/127d0761-7c63-46f0-b08e-d0d9f7cad9da/Plant_leaf_diseases_dataset_without_augmentation.zip>https://data.mendeley.com/datasets/tywbtsjrjv/1/files/127d0761-7c63-46f0-b08e-d0d9f7cad9da/Plant_leaf_diseases_dataset_without_augmentation.zip</denchmark-link>
Describe the expected behavior Success of the tfds.load
<denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1aZ4EjqnNa8g0fWg9lccdJLmr0KU4ZL8r?usp=sharing>https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1aZ4EjqnNa8g0fWg9lccdJLmr0KU4ZL8r?usp=sharing</denchmark-link>
